They got into the carriage and drove for a few minutes in silence. 
"There is still much, much before us," he said, as if with an old man's penetration he un- derstood all that was passing in Bolk6nski's mind. "If a tenth part of his detachment re- turns I shall thank God," he added as if speak- ing to himself.
